question: Which actor is to be honoured with the Screen Actors Guild (SAG) Life Achievement Award?
explanation: LOS ANGELES (CNS) - Oscar-winning actor Robert De Niro was named the recipient of the Screen Actors Guild Life Achievement Award, which honors performers who foster the \"finest ideals of the acting profession.\" The Screen Actors Guild Life Achievement Award is presented by the Screen Actors Guild\'s National Honors and Tributes Committee for \"outstanding achievement in fostering the finest ideals of the acting profession.
